name: EVIDENCE items unlocked alphabetically by each labelled photo taken
SANITY dropped by spending 2 minutes in the dark before starting map
LOCATE GHOST with Sensors (Motion and Sound) only
EVIDENCE items can't include EMF Reader or Thermometer
LEAVE WITH 2 of any carryable item from house
TAKE PHOTO of the EMF Reader with a reading of 2 or greater
FLASHLIGHTS are replaced by UV Lights
TAKE PHOTO of the van from inside the map
ENTERING VAN only 1 time unless leaving map
GHOST NAME said 3 times when first entering map
GHOST ROOM must not be left after identified until the Ghost appears
